TopicTitle: Unable to launch Launcher or Game

Articles.Content:
Up until today my computer ran KSP fine. Unfortunately it experienced a power failure and I've had to repair the registry with chkdsk /r. The system has been retsored, but Kerbal Space Program will no longer run in any way. SEE BOTTOM Attempting to run either Launcher.exe or KSP.exe results in a white window immediately after launch. These white screens are invariably unresponsive and cannot be closed without Task Manager. I have updated my graphics drivers and uninstalled and reinstalled the game, and the issue persists. I have created both the launcher and KSP.exe as firewall and antivirus exceptions. I have restarted the computer several times.

I am running KSP 1.0.4 on Windows 10 64-bit. I am not running through Steam.

Well, someone here might have run across this and know a fix, but if you ask me I think you need to back everything up you can't afford to lose and try repairing the OS.

That'd be the only way to ensure the OS and DirectX are not using corrupted files, without employing an experienced Windows engineer who knows how to find and replace anything that's broken, as most PC repair shops will only format your PC and reinstall Windows anyway.

So I formatted my drive and completely reinstalled Windows. No more white screens, but the game itself is extremely laggy. All animations run at 1-4 FPS, including the Main Menu's, part rotation and Kerbal/vehicle movement in the VAB, and button selection.

Upon updating my graphics driver my issues appear to finally be resolved. Thanks so much for your help sal.
